body_html:
A lot of the bazel upgrades can be incorporated into this change.
David, could you update all our Dockerfiles that install bazel?
We will then also need to upgrade out MAC executors manually before we merge this.
Also this file:
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/install/install_bazel.sh
